tswitem.name: Critical Ablation Module
tswitem.tooltip:
Critical Ablation Module
AEGIS-Module (QL 2)
Bind when pickup
Whenever you critically heal an ally whose AEGIS shield type matches your AEGIS weapon type, you have a 20% chance to apply a beneficial effect to that ally which reduces all incoming AEGIS damage by 20% / 30% for 4 seconds.
